**useBatchHeaders** | **Boolean** | Use BHS and FHS header |

**usePid14ForPatientEmail** | **Boolean** | Use the PID-14 field for patient email instead of the standard PID-13 field | [optional] [default to false]
**useTestProcessingMode** | **Boolean** | Set a test process mode flag | [optional] [default to false]
